DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of myocardial ischemic-reperfusion injury during off- and on- pump CABG.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Myocardial Ischemic-Reperfusion Injury During Off- and On- Pump CABG
DOC.detailed_description: Assessment of myocardial ischemic-reperfusion injury during off- and on- pump CABG is monitored by intraoperative measurement of serum level of myeloperoxidase before sternotomy and after sternal closure.
DOC.criteria: ischemic heart disease valve disease diabetes millitus
DOC.keyword: comparison of On- and Off- Pump CABG
